tha-ap366:1.1_0: I was born of an articulation,
tha-ap366:1.4_0: walking mindfully in the shade of the terrace.
tha-ap366:2.2_0: I made friends with my head,
tha-ap366:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap366:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap366:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap366:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kevaddha.
